200bool compare_sound_alert( const dangerous_sound &sound_a, const dangerous_sound &sound_b )
201{
202 if( sound_a.type != sound_b.type ) {
203 return sound_a.type < sound_b.type;
204 }
205 return sound_a.volume < sound_b.volume;
206}
207
208static bool clear_shot_reach( const tripoint &from, const tripoint &to, bool check_ally = true )
209{
210 std::vector<tripoint> path = line_to( from, to );
211 path.pop_back();
212 for( const tripoint &p : path ) {
213 Creature *inter = g->critter_at( p );
214 if( check_ally && inter != nullptr ) {
215 return false;
216 } else if( get_map().impassable( p ) ) {
217 return false;
218 }
219 }
220
221 return true;
222}
223
224tripoint npc::good_escape_direction( bool include_pos )
225{
226 map &here = get_map();
227 if( path.empty() ) {
228 zone_type_id retreat_zone = zone_type_id( "NPC_RETREAT" );
229 const tripoint &abs_pos = global_square_location();
230 const zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
231 cata::optional<tripoint> retreat_target = mgr.get_nearest( retreat_zone, abs_pos, 60,
232 fac_id );
233 if( retreat_target && *retreat_target != abs_pos ) {
234 update_path( here.getlocal( *retreat_target ) );
235 if( !path.empty() ) {
236 return path[0];
237 }
238 }
239 }
240
241 std::vector<tripoint> candidates;
242
243 const auto rate_pt = [&]( const tripoint & pt, const float threat_val ) {
244 if( !can_move_to( pt, !rules.has_flag( ally_rule::allow_bash ) ) ) {
245 return MAX_FLOAT;
246 }
247 float rating = threat_val;
248 for( const auto &e : here.field_at( pt ) ) {
249 if( is_dangerous_field( e.second ) ) {
250 // TODO: Rate fire higher than smoke
251 rating += e.second.get_field_intensity();
252 }
253 }
254 return rating;
255 };
256
257 float best_rating = include_pos ? rate_pt( pos(), 0.0f ) : FLT_MAX;
258 candidates.emplace_back( pos() );
259
260 std::map<direction, float> adj_map;
261 for( direction pt_dir : npc_threat_dir ) {
262 const tripoint &pt = pos() + direction_XY( pt_dir );
263 float cur_rating = rate_pt( pt, ai_cache.threat_map[ pt_dir ] );
264 adj_map[pt_dir] = cur_rating;
265 if( cur_rating == best_rating ) {
266 candidates.emplace_back( pos() + direction_XY( pt_dir ) );
267 } else if( cur_rating < best_rating ) {
268 candidates.clear();
269 candidates.emplace_back( pos() + direction_XY( pt_dir ) );
270 best_rating = cur_rating;
271 }
272 }
273 return random_entry( candidates );
274}
275
276bool npc::sees_dangerous_field( const tripoint &p ) const
277{
278 return is_dangerous_fields( get_map().field_at( p ) );
279}
280
281bool npc::could_move_onto( const tripoint &p ) const
282{
283 map &here = get_map();
284 if( !here.passable( p ) ) {
285 return false;
286 }
287
288 if( !sees_dangerous_field( p ) ) {
289 return true;
290 }
291
292 const auto fields_here = here.field_at( pos() );
293 for( const auto &e : here.field_at( p ) ) {
294 if( !is_dangerous_field( e.second ) ) {
295 continue;
296 }
297
298 const auto *entry_here = fields_here.find_field( e.first );
299 if( entry_here == nullptr || entry_here->get_field_intensity() < e.second.get_field_intensity() ) {
300 return false;
301 }
302 }
303
304 return true;
305}
306
307std::vector<sphere> npc::find_dangerous_explosives() const
308{
309 std::vector<sphere> result;
310
311 const auto active_items = get_map().get_active_items_in_radius( pos(), MAX_VIEW_DISTANCE,
312 special_item_type::explosive );
313
314 for( const auto &elem : active_items ) {
315 const auto use = elem->type->get_use( "explosion" );
316
317 if( !use ) {
318 continue;
319 }
320
321 const explosion_iuse *actor = dynamic_cast<const explosion_iuse *>( use->get_actor_ptr() );
322 const int safe_range = actor->explosion.safe_range();
323
324 if( rl_dist( pos(), elem.position() ) >= safe_range ) {
325 continue; // Far enough.
326 }
327
328 const int turns_to_evacuate = 2 * safe_range / speed_rating();
329
330 if( elem->charges > turns_to_evacuate ) {
331 continue; // Consider only imminent dangers.
332 }
333
334 result.emplace_back( elem.position(), safe_range );
335 }
336
337 return result;
338}
339
340float npc::evaluate_enemy( const Creature &target ) const
341{
342 if( target.is_monster() ) {
343 const monster &mon = dynamic_cast<const monster &>( target );
344 float diff = static_cast<float>( mon.type->difficulty );
345 return std::min( diff, NPC_DANGER_MAX );
346 } else if( target.is_npc() || target.is_player() ) {
347 return std::min( character_danger( dynamic_cast<const player &>( target ) ),
348 NPC_DANGER_MAX );
349 } else {
350 return 0.0f;
351 }
352}
353
354static bool too_close( const tripoint &critter_pos, const tripoint &ally_pos, const int def_radius )
355{
356 return rl_dist( critter_pos, ally_pos ) <= def_radius;
357}
358
359void npc::assess_danger()
360{
361 float assessment = 0.0f;
362 float highest_priority = 1.0f;
363 int def_radius = rules.has_flag( ally_rule::follow_close ) ? follow_distance() : 6;
364
365 // Radius we can attack without moving
366 int max_range;
367 if( confident_range_cache ) {
368 max_range = *confident_range_cache;
369 } else {
370 invalidate_range_cache();
371 max_range = *confident_range_cache;
372 }
373
374 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
375 const bool self_defense_only = rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NO_MOVE ||
376 rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NONE;
377 const bool no_fighting = rules.has_flag( ally_rule::forbid_engage );
378 const bool must_retreat = is_walking_with() && rules.has_flag( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
379 !too_close( pos(), player_character.pos(), follow_distance() );
380
381 if( is_player_ally() ) {
382 if( rules.engagement == combat_engagement::FREE_FIRE ) {
383 def_radius = std::max( 6, max_range );
384 } else if( self_defense_only ) {
385 def_radius = max_range;
386 } else if( no_fighting ) {
387 def_radius = 1;
388 }
389 }
390
391 const auto ok_by_rules = [max_range, def_radius, this, &player_character]( const Creature & c,
392 int dist,
393 int scaled_dist ) {
394 // If we're forbidden to attack, no need to check engagement rules
395 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::forbid_engage ) ) {
396 return false;
397 }
398 switch( rules.engagement ) {
399 case combat_engagement::NONE:
400 return false;
401 case combat_engagement::CLOSE:
402 // Either close to player or close enough that we can reach it and close to us
403 return ( dist <= max_range && scaled_dist <= def_radius * 0.5 ) ||
404 too_close( c.pos(), player_character.pos(), def_radius );
405 case combat_engagement::WEAK:
406 return c.get_hp() <= average_damage_dealt();
407 case combat_engagement::HIT:
408 return c.has_effect( effect_hit_by_player );
409 case combat_engagement::NO_MOVE:
410 return dist <= max_range;
411 case combat_engagement::FREE_FIRE:
412 return dist <= max_range;
413 case combat_engagement::ALL:
414 return true;
415 }
416
417 return true;
418 };
419 std::map<direction, float> cur_threat_map;
420 // start with a decayed version of last turn's map
421 for( direction threat_dir : npc_threat_dir ) {
422 cur_threat_map[ threat_dir ] = 0.25f * ai_cache.threat_map[ threat_dir ];
423 }
424 map &here = get_map();
425 // first, check if we're about to be consumed by fire
426 // TODO: Use the field cache
427 for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 6 ) ) {
428 if( pt == pos() || here.has_flag( TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, pt ) ) {
429 continue;
430 }
431 if( here.get_field( pt, fd_fire ) != nullptr ) {
432 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), pt );
433 cur_threat_map[direction_from( pos(), pt )] += 2.0f * ( NPC_DANGER_MAX - dist );
434 if( dist < 3 && !has_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad ) ) {
435 warn_about( "fire_bad", 1_minutes );
436 add_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad, 5_turns );
437 path.clear();
438 }
439 }
440 }
441
442 // find our Character friends and enemies
443 std::vector<weak_ptr_fast<Creature>> hostile_guys;
444 for( const npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
445 if( &guy == this ) {
446 continue;
447 }
448
449 if( has_faction_relationship( guy, npc_factions::watch_your_back ) ) {
450 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( guy ) );
451 } else if( attitude_to( guy ) != A_NEUTRAL && sees( guy.pos() ) ) {
452 hostile_guys.emplace_back( g->shared_from( guy ) );
453 }
454 }
455 if( sees( player_character.pos() ) ) {
456 if( is_enemy() ) {
457 hostile_guys.emplace_back( g->shared_from( player_character ) );
458 } else if( is_friendly( player_character ) ) {
459 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( player_character ) );
460 }
461 }
462
463 for( const monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
464 auto att = critter.attitude_to( *this );
465 if( att == A_FRIENDLY ) {
466 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( critter ) );
467 continue;
468 }
469 if( att != A_HOSTILE && ( critter.friendly || !is_enemy() ) ) {
470 continue;
471 }
472 if( !sees( critter ) ) {
473 continue;
474 }
475 float critter_threat = evaluate_enemy( critter );
476 // warn and consider the odds for distant enemies
477 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), critter.pos() );
478 if( ( is_enemy() || !critter.friendly ) ) {
479 assessment += critter_threat;
480 if( critter_threat > ( 8.0f + personality.bravery + rng( 0, 5 ) ) ) {
481 warn_about( "monster", 10_minutes, critter.type->nname(), dist, critter.pos() );
482 }
483 }
484 if( must_retreat || no_fighting ) {
485 continue;
486 }
487 // ignore targets behind glass even if we can see them
488 if( !clear_shot_reach( pos(), critter.pos(), false ) ) {
489 continue;
490 }
491
492 float scaled_distance = std::max( 1.0f, dist / critter.speed_rating() );
493 float hp_percent = 1.0f - static_cast<float>( critter.get_hp() ) / critter.get_hp_max();
494 float critter_danger = std::max( critter_threat * ( hp_percent * 0.5f + 0.5f ),
495 NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW );
496 ai_cache.total_danger += critter_danger / scaled_distance;
497
498 // don't ignore monsters that are too close or too close to an ally if we can move
499 bool is_too_close = dist <= def_radius;
500 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : ai_cache.friends ) {
501 if( is_too_close || self_defense_only ) {
502 break;
503 }
504 // HACK: Bit of a dirty hack - sometimes shared_from, returns nullptr or bad weak_ptr for
505 // friendly NPC when the NPC is riding a creature - I don't know why.
506 // so this skips the bad weak_ptrs, but this doesn't functionally change the AI Priority
507 // because the horse the NPC is riding is still in the ai_cache.friends vector,
508 // so either one would count as a friendly for this purpose.
509 if( guy.lock() ) {
510 is_too_close |= too_close( critter.pos(), guy.lock()->pos(), def_radius );
511 }
512 }
513 // ignore distant monsters that our rules prevent us from attacking
514 if( !is_too_close && is_player_ally() && !ok_by_rules( critter, dist, scaled_distance ) ) {
515 continue;
516 }
517 // prioritize the biggest, nearest threats, or the biggest threats that are threatening
518 // us or an ally
519 // critter danger is always at least NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW
520 float priority = std::max( critter_danger - 2.0f * ( scaled_distance - 1.0f ),
521 is_too_close ? critter_danger : 0.0f );
522 cur_threat_map[direction_from( pos(), critter.pos() )] += priority;
523 if( priority > highest_priority ) {
524 highest_priority = priority;
525 ai_cache.target = g->shared_from( critter );
526 ai_cache.danger = critter_danger;
527 }
528 }
529
530 if( assessment == 0.0 && hostile_guys.empty() ) {
531 ai_cache.danger_assessment = assessment;
532 return;
533 }
534 const auto handle_hostile = [&]( const Character & foe, float foe_threat,
535 const std::string & bogey, const std::string & warning ) {
536 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), foe.pos() );
537 if( foe_threat > ( 8.0f + personality.bravery + rng( 0, 5 ) ) ) {
538 warn_about( "monster", 10_minutes, bogey, dist, foe.pos() );
539 }
540
541 int scaled_distance = std::max( 1, ( 100 * dist ) / foe.get_speed() );
542 ai_cache.total_danger += foe_threat / scaled_distance;
543 if( must_retreat || no_fighting ) {
544 return 0.0f;
545 }
546 // ignore targets behind glass even if we can see them
547 if( !clear_shot_reach( pos(), foe.pos(), false ) ) {
548 return 0.0f;
549 }
550 bool is_too_close = dist <= def_radius;
551 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : ai_cache.friends ) {
552 if( self_defense_only ) {
553 break;
554 }
555 is_too_close |= too_close( foe.pos(), guy.lock()->pos(), def_radius );
556 if( is_too_close ) {
557 break;
558 }
559 }
560
561 if( !is_player_ally() || is_too_close || ok_by_rules( foe, dist, scaled_distance ) ) {
562 float priority = std::max( foe_threat - 2.0f * ( scaled_distance - 1 ),
563 is_too_close ? std::max( foe_threat, NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ) :
564 0.0f );
565 cur_threat_map[direction_from( pos(), foe.pos() )] += priority;
566 if( priority > highest_priority ) {
567 warn_about( warning, 1_minutes );
568 highest_priority = priority;
569 ai_cache.danger = foe_threat;
570 ai_cache.target = g->shared_from( foe );
571 }
572 }
573 return foe_threat;
574 };
575
576 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : hostile_guys ) {
577 player *foe = dynamic_cast<player *>( guy.lock().get() );
578 if( foe && foe->is_npc() ) {
579 assessment += handle_hostile( *foe, evaluate_enemy( *foe ), "bandit", "kill_npc" );
580 }
581 }
582
583 for( const weak_ptr_fast<Creature> &guy : ai_cache.friends ) {
584 player *ally = dynamic_cast<player *>( guy.lock().get() );
585 if( !( ally && ally->is_npc() ) ) {
586 continue;
587 }
588 float guy_threat = evaluate_enemy( *ally );
589 float min_danger = assessment >= NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ? NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW : -10.0f;
590 assessment = std::max( min_danger, assessment - guy_threat * 0.5f );
591 }
592
593 if( sees( player_character.pos() ) ) {
594 // Mod for the player
595 // cap player difficulty at 150
596 float player_diff = evaluate_enemy( player_character );
597 if( is_enemy() ) {
598 assessment += handle_hostile( player_character, player_diff, "maniac", "kill_player" );
599 } else if( is_friendly( player_character ) ) {
600 float min_danger = assessment >= NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ? NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW : -10.0f;
601 assessment = std::max( min_danger, assessment - player_diff * 0.5f );
602 ai_cache.friends.emplace_back( g->shared_from( player_character ) );
603 }
604 }
605 assessment *= 0.1f;
606 if( !has_effect( effect_npc_run_away ) && !has_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad ) ) {
607 float my_diff = evaluate_enemy( *this );
608 if( ( my_diff * 0.5f + personality.bravery + rng( 0, 10 ) ) < assessment ) {
609 time_duration run_away_for = 5_turns + 1_turns * rng( 0, 5 );
610 warn_about( "run_away", run_away_for );
611 add_effect( effect_npc_run_away, run_away_for );
612 path.clear();
613 }
614 }
615 // update the threat cache
616 for( size_t i = 0; i < 8; i++ ) {
617 direction threat_dir = npc_threat_dir[i];
618 direction dir_right = npc_threat_dir[( i + 1 ) % 8];
619 direction dir_left = npc_threat_dir[( i + 7 ) % 8 ];
620 ai_cache.threat_map[threat_dir] = cur_threat_map[threat_dir] + 0.1f *
621 ( cur_threat_map[dir_right] + cur_threat_map[dir_left] );
622 }
623 if( assessment <= 2.0f ) {
624 assessment = -10.0f + 5.0f * assessment; // Low danger if no monsters around
625 }
626 ai_cache.danger_assessment = assessment;
627}
628
629float npc::character_danger( const Character &uc ) const
630{
631 // TODO: Remove this when possible
632 const player &u = dynamic_cast<const player &>( uc );
633 float ret = 0.0;
634 bool u_gun = u.weapon.is_gun();
635 bool my_gun = weapon.is_gun();
636 double u_weap_val = u.weapon_value( u.weapon );
637 const double &my_weap_val = ai_cache.my_weapon_value;
638 if( u_gun && !my_gun ) {
639 u_weap_val *= 1.5f;
640 }
641 ret += u_weap_val;
642
643 ret += hp_percentage() * get_hp_max( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) / 100.0 / my_weap_val;
644
645 ret += my_gun ? u.get_dodge() / 2 : u.get_dodge();
646
647 ret *= std::max( 0.5, u.get_speed() / 100.0 );
648
649 add_msg( m_debug, "%s danger: %1f", u.disp_name(), ret );
650 return ret;
651}
652
653void npc::regen_ai_cache()
654{
655 map &here = get_map();
656 auto i = std::begin( ai_cache.sound_alerts );
657 while( i != std::end( ai_cache.sound_alerts ) ) {
658 if( sees( here.getlocal( i->abs_pos ) ) ) {
659 i = ai_cache.sound_alerts.erase( i );
660 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() == 1 ) {
661 path.clear();
662 }
663 } else {
664 ++i;
665 }
666 }
667 float old_assessment = ai_cache.danger_assessment;
668 ai_cache.friends.clear();
669 ai_cache.target = shared_ptr_fast<Creature>();
670 ai_cache.ally = shared_ptr_fast<Creature>();
671 ai_cache.can_heal.clear_all();
672 ai_cache.danger = 0.0f;
673 ai_cache.total_danger = 0.0f;
674 ai_cache.my_weapon_value = weapon_value( weapon );
675 ai_cache.dangerous_explosives = find_dangerous_explosives();
676
677 assess_danger();
678 if( old_assessment > NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW && ai_cache.danger_assessment <= 0 ) {
679 warn_about( "relax", 30_minutes );
680 } else if( old_assessment <= 0.0f && ai_cache.danger_assessment > NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ) {
681 warn_about( "general_danger" );
682 }
683 // Non-allied NPCs with a completed mission should move to the player
684 if( !is_player_ally() && !is_stationary( true ) ) {
685 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
686 for( auto &miss : chatbin.missions_assigned ) {
687 if( miss->is_complete( getID() ) ) {
688 // unless the player found an item and already told the NPC he wanted to keep it
689 const mission_goal &mgoal = miss->get_type().goal;
690 if( ( mgoal == MGOAL_FIND_ITEM || mgoal == MGOAL_FIND_ANY_ITEM ||
691 mgoal == MGOAL_FIND_ITEM_GROUP ) &&
692 has_effect( effect_npc_player_looking ) ) {
693 continue;
694 }
695 if( global_omt_location() != player_character.global_omt_location() ) {
696 goal = player_character.global_omt_location();
697 }
698 set_attitude( NPCATT_TALK );
699 break;
700 }
701 }
702 }
703}
704
705void npc::move()
706{
707 // don't just return from this function without doing something
708 // that will eventually subtract moves, or change the NPC to a different type of action.
709 // because this will result in an infinite loop
710 if( attitude == NPCATT_FLEE ) {
711 set_attitude( NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ); // Only run for so many hours
712 } else if( attitude == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP && !has_effect( effect_npc_flee_player ) ) {
713 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
714 }
715 regen_ai_cache();
716 adjust_power_cbms();
717 // NPCs under operation should just stay still
718 if( activity.id() == activity_id( "ACT_OPERATION" ) ) {
719 execute_action( npc_player_activity );
720 return;
721 }
722
723 npc_action action = npc_undecided;
724
725 static const std::string no_target_str = "none";
726 const Creature *target = current_target();
727 const std::string &target_name = target != nullptr ? target->disp_name() : no_target_str;
728 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s: target = %s, danger = %.1f, range = %d",
729 name, target_name, ai_cache.danger, weapon.is_gun() ? confident_shoot_range( weapon,
730 recoil_total() ) : weapon.reach_range( *this ) );
731
732 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
733 //faction opinion determines if it should consider you hostile
734 if( !is_enemy() && guaranteed_hostile() && sees( player_character ) ) {
735 if( is_player_ally() ) {
736 mutiny();
737 }
738 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s turning hostile because is guaranteed_hostile()", name );
739 if( op_of_u.fear > 10 + personality.aggression + personality.bravery ) {
740 set_attitude( NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ); // We don't want to take u on!
741 } else {
742 set_attitude( NPCATT_KILL ); // Yeah, we think we could take you!
743 }
744 }
745
746 /* This bypasses the logic to determine the npc action, but this all needs to be rewritten
747 * anyway.
748 * NPC won't avoid dangerous terrain while accompanying the player inside a vehicle to keep
749 * them from inadvertently getting themselves run over and/or cause vehicle related errors.
750 * NPCs flee from uncontained fires within 3 tiles
751 */
752 if( !in_vehicle && ( sees_dangerous_field( pos() ) || has_effect( effect_npc_fire_bad ) ) ) {
753 if( sees_dangerous_field( pos() ) ) {
754 path.clear();
755 }
756 const tripoint escape_dir = good_escape_direction( sees_dangerous_field( pos() ) );
757 if( escape_dir != pos() ) {
758 move_to( escape_dir );
759 return;
760 }
761 }
762
763 // TODO: Place player-aiding actions here, with a weight
764
765 /* NPCs are fairly suicidal so at this point we will do a quick check to see if
766 * something nasty is going to happen.
767 */
768
769 if( is_enemy() && vehicle_danger( avoidance_vehicles_radius ) > 0 ) {
770 // TODO: Think about how this actually needs to work, for now assume flee from player
771 ai_cache.target = g->shared_from( player_character );
772 }
773
774 map &here = get_map();
775 if( !ai_cache.dangerous_explosives.empty() ) {
776 action = npc_escape_explosion;
777 } else if( target == &player_character && attitude == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ) {
778 action = method_of_fleeing();
779 } else if( has_effect( effect_npc_run_away ) ) {
780 action = method_of_fleeing();
781 } else if( has_effect( effect_asthma ) && ( has_charges( itype_inhaler, 1 ) ||
782 has_charges( itype_oxygen_tank, 1 ) ||
783 has_charges( itype_smoxygen_tank, 1 ) ) ) {
784 action = npc_heal;
785 } else if( target != nullptr && ai_cache.danger > 0 ) {
786 action = method_of_attack();
787 } else if( !ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() && !is_walking_with() ) {
788 tripoint cur_s_abs_pos = ai_cache.s_abs_pos;
789 if( !ai_cache.guard_pos ) {
790 ai_cache.guard_pos = here.getabs( pos() );
791 }
792 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() > 1 ) {
793 std::sort( ai_cache.sound_alerts.begin(), ai_cache.sound_alerts.end(),
794 compare_sound_alert );
795 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() > 10 ) {
796 ai_cache.sound_alerts.resize( 10 );
797 }
798 }
799 action = npc_investigate_sound;
800 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.front().abs_pos != cur_s_abs_pos ) {
801 ai_cache.stuck = 0;
802 ai_cache.s_abs_pos = ai_cache.sound_alerts.front().abs_pos;
803 } else if( ai_cache.stuck > 10 ) {
804 ai_cache.stuck = 0;
805 if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.size() == 1 ) {
806 ai_cache.sound_alerts.clear();
807 action = npc_return_to_guard_pos;
808 } else {
809 ai_cache.s_abs_pos = ai_cache.sound_alerts.at( 1 ).abs_pos;
810 }
811 }
812 if( action == npc_investigate_sound ) {
813 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s: investigating sound at x(%d) y(%d)", name,
814 ai_cache.s_abs_pos.x, ai_cache.s_abs_pos.y );
815 }
816 } else if( ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() && ai_cache.guard_pos ) {
817 tripoint return_guard_pos = *ai_cache.guard_pos;
818 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC %s: returning to guard spot at x(%d) y(%d)", name,
819 return_guard_pos.x, return_guard_pos.y );
820 action = npc_return_to_guard_pos;
821 } else {
822 // No present danger
823 deactivate_combat_cbms();
824
825 action = address_needs();
826 print_action( "address_needs %s", action );
827
828 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
829 action = address_player();
830 print_action( "address_player %s", action );
831 }
832 }
833
834 // check if in vehicle before doing any other follow activities
835 if( action == npc_undecided && is_walking_with() && player_character.in_vehicle && !in_vehicle ) {
836 action = npc_follow_embarked;
837 }
838
839 if( action == npc_undecided && is_walking_with() && rules.has_flag( ally_rule::follow_close ) &&
840 rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) > follow_distance() ) {
841 action = npc_follow_player;
842 }
843
844 if( action == npc_undecided && attitude == NPCATT_ACTIVITY ) {
845 if( has_stashed_activity() ) {
846 if( !check_outbounds_activity( get_stashed_activity(), true ) ) {
847 assign_stashed_activity();
848 } else {
849 // wait a turn, because next turn, the object of our activity
850 // may have been loaded in.
851 set_moves( 0 );
852 }
853 return;
854 }
855 std::vector<tripoint> activity_route = get_auto_move_route();
856 if( !activity_route.empty() && !has_destination_activity() ) {
857 tripoint final_destination;
858 if( destination_point ) {
859 final_destination = here.getlocal( *destination_point );
860 } else {
861 final_destination = activity_route.back();
862 }
863 update_path( final_destination );
864 if( !path.empty() ) {
865 move_to_next();
866 return;
867 }
868 }
869 if( has_destination_activity() ) {
870 start_destination_activity();
871 action = npc_player_activity;
872 } else if( has_player_activity() ) {
873 action = npc_player_activity;
874 }
875 }
876 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
877 // an interrupted activity can cause this situation. stops allied NPCs zooming off
878 // like random NPCs
879 if( attitude == NPCATT_ACTIVITY && !activity ) {
880 revert_after_activity();
881 if( is_ally( player_character ) ) {
882 attitude = NPCATT_FOLLOW;
883 mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
884 }
885 }
886 if( assigned_camp && attitude != NPCATT_ACTIVITY ) {
887 if( has_job() && calendar::once_every( 10_minutes ) && find_job_to_perform() ) {
888 action = npc_player_activity;
889 } else {
890 action = npc_worker_downtime;
891 goal = global_omt_location();
892 }
893 }
894 if( is_stationary( true ) && !assigned_camp ) {
895 // if we're in a vehicle, stay in the vehicle
896 if( in_vehicle ) {
897 action = npc_pause;
898 goal = global_omt_location();
899 } else {
900 action = goal == global_omt_location() ? npc_pause : npc_goto_destination;
901 }
902 } else if( has_new_items && scan_new_items() ) {
903 return;
904 } else if( !fetching_item ) {
905 find_item();
906 print_action( "find_item %s", action );
907 } else if( assigned_camp ) {
908 // this should be covered above, but justincase to stop them zooming away.
909 action = npc_pause;
910 }
911
912 // check if in vehicle before rushing off to fetch things
913 if( is_walking_with() && player_character.in_vehicle ) {
914 action = npc_follow_embarked;
915 } else if( fetching_item ) {
916 // Set to true if find_item() found something
917 action = npc_pickup;
918 } else if( is_following() ) {
919 // No items, so follow the player?
920 action = npc_follow_player;
921 }
922 // Friendly NPCs who are followers/ doing tasks for the player should never get here.
923 // This will revert them to a dynamic NPC state.
924 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
925 // Do our long-term action
926 action = long_term_goal_action();
927 print_action( "long_term_goal_action %s", action );
928 }
929 }
930
931 /* Sometimes we'll be following the player at this point, but close enough that
932 * "following" means standing still. If that's the case, if there are any
933 * monsters around, we should attack them after all!
934 *
935 * If we are following a embarked player and we are in a vehicle then shoot anyway
936 * as we are most likely riding shotgun
937 */
938 if( ai_cache.danger > 0 && target != nullptr &&
939 (
940 ( action == npc_follow_embarked && in_vehicle ) ||
941 ( action == npc_follow_player &&
942 ( rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) <= follow_distance() ||
943 posz() != player_character.posz() ) )
944 ) ) {
945 action = method_of_attack();
946 }
947
948 add_msg( m_debug, "%s chose action %s.", name, npc_action_name( action ) );
949 execute_action( action );
950}
951
952void npc::execute_action( npc_action action )
953{
954 int oldmoves = moves;
955 tripoint tar = pos();
956 Creature *cur = current_target();
957 if( action == npc_flee ) {
958 tar = good_escape_direction( false );
959 } else if( cur != nullptr ) {
960 tar = cur->pos();
961 }
962 /*
963 debugmsg("%s ran execute_action() with target = %d! Action %s",
964 name, target, npc_action_name(action));
965 */
966
967 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
968 map &here = get_map();
969 switch( action ) {
970 case npc_pause:
971 move_pause();
972 break;
973 case npc_worker_downtime:
974 worker_downtime();
975 break;
976 case npc_reload: {
977 do_reload( weapon );
978 }
979 break;
980
981 case npc_investigate_sound: {
982 tripoint cur_pos = pos();
983 update_path( here.getlocal( ai_cache.s_abs_pos ) );
984 move_to_next();
985 if( pos() == cur_pos ) {
986 ai_cache.stuck += 1;
987 }
988 }
989 break;
990
991 case npc_return_to_guard_pos: {
992 const tripoint local_guard_pos = here.getlocal( *ai_cache.guard_pos );
993 update_path( local_guard_pos );
994 if( pos() == local_guard_pos || path.empty() ) {
995 move_pause();
996 ai_cache.guard_pos = cata::nullopt;
997 path.clear();
998 } else {
999 move_to_next();
1000 }
1001 }
1002 break;
1003
1004 case npc_sleep: {
1005 // TODO: Allow stims when not too tired
1006 // Find a nice spot to sleep
1007 int best_sleepy = sleep_spot( pos() );
1008 tripoint best_spot = pos();
1009 for( const tripoint &p : closest_points_first( pos(), 6 ) ) {
1010 if( !could_move_onto( p ) || !g->is_empty( p ) ) {
1011 continue;
1012 }
1013
1014 // TODO: Blankets when it's cold
1015 const int sleepy = sleep_spot( p );
1016 if( sleepy > best_sleepy ) {
1017 best_sleepy = sleepy;
1018 best_spot = p;
1019 }
1020 }
1021 if( is_walking_with() ) {
1022 complain_about( "napping", 30_minutes, _( "<warn_sleep>" ) );
1023 }
1024 update_path( best_spot );
1025 // TODO: Handle empty path better
1026 if( best_spot == pos() || path.empty() ) {
1027 move_pause();
1028 if( !has_effect( effect_lying_down ) ) {
1029 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_soporific );
1030 add_effect( effect_lying_down, 30_minutes, num_bp, 1 );
1031 if( player_character.sees( *this ) && !player_character.in_sleep_state() ) {
1032 add_msg( _( "%s lies down to sleep." ), name );
1033 }
1034 }
1035 } else {
1036 move_to_next();
1037 }
1038 }
1039 break;
1040
1041 case npc_pickup:
1042 pick_up_item();
1043 break;
1044
1045 case npc_heal:
1046 heal_self();
1047 break;
1048
1049 case npc_use_painkiller:
1050 use_painkiller();
1051 break;
1052
1053 case npc_drop_items:
1054 /* NPCs can't choose this action anymore, but at least it works */
1055 drop_invalid_inventory();
1056 /* drop_items is still broken
1057 * drop_items( weight_carried() - weight_capacity(),
1058 * volume_carried() - volume_capacity() );
1059 */
1060 move_pause();
1061 break;
1062
1063 case npc_flee:
1064 if( path.empty() ) {
1065 move_to( tar );
1066 } else {
1067 move_to_next();
1068 }
1069 break;
1070
1071 case npc_reach_attack:
1072 if( can_use_offensive_cbm() ) {
1073 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_hydraulics );
1074 }
1075 reach_attack( tar );
1076 break;
1077 case npc_melee:
1078 update_path( tar );
1079 if( path.size() > 1 ) {
1080 move_to_next();
1081 } else if( path.size() == 1 ) {
1082 if( cur != nullptr ) {
1083 if( can_use_offensive_cbm() ) {
1084 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_hydraulics );
1085 }
1086 melee_attack( *cur, true );
1087 }
1088 } else {
1089 look_for_player( player_character );
1090 }
1091 break;
1092
1093 case npc_aim:
1094 aim();
1095 break;
1096
1097 case npc_shoot: {
1098 auto mode = weapon.gun_current_mode();
1099 if( !mode ) {
1100 debugmsg( "NPC tried to shoot without valid mode" );
1101 break;
1102 }
1103 aim();
1104 if( is_hallucination() ) {
1105 pretend_fire( this, mode.qty, *mode );
1106 } else {
1107 fire_gun( tar, mode.qty, *mode );
1108 // "discard" the fake bio weapon after shooting it
1109 if( cbm_weapon_index >= 0 ) {
1110 discharge_cbm_weapon();
1111 }
1112 }
1113 break;
1114 }
1115
1116 case npc_look_for_player:
1117 if( saw_player_recently() && last_player_seen_pos && sees( *last_player_seen_pos ) ) {
1118 update_path( *last_player_seen_pos );
1119 move_to_next();
1120 } else {
1121 look_for_player( player_character );
1122 }
1123 break;
1124
1125 case npc_heal_player: {
1126 player *patient = dynamic_cast<player *>( current_ally() );
1127 if( patient ) {
1128 update_path( patient->pos() );
1129 if( path.size() == 1 ) { // We're adjacent to u, and thus can heal u
1130 heal_player( *patient );
1131 } else if( !path.empty() ) {
1132 say( _( "Hold still %s, I'm coming to help you." ), patient->disp_name() );
1133 move_to_next();
1134 } else {
1135 move_pause();
1136 }
1137 }
1138 break;
1139 }
1140 case npc_follow_player:
1141 update_path( player_character.pos() );
1142 if( static_cast<int>( path.size() ) <= follow_distance() &&
1143 player_character.posz() == posz() ) { // We're close enough to u.
1144 move_pause();
1145 } else if( !path.empty() ) {
1146 move_to_next();
1147 } else {
1148 move_pause();
1149 }
1150 // TODO: Make it only happen when it's safe
1151 complain();
1152 break;
1153
1154 case npc_follow_embarked: {
1155 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( player_character.pos() );
1156
1157 if( !vp ) {
1158 debugmsg( "Following an embarked player with no vehicle at their location?" );
1159 // TODO: change to wait? - for now pause
1160 move_pause();
1161 break;
1162 }
1163 vehicle *const veh = &vp->vehicle();
1164
1165 // Try to find the last destination
1166 // This is mount point, not actual position
1167 point last_dest( INT_MIN, INT_MIN );
1168 if( !path.empty() && veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( path[path.size() - 1] ) ) == veh ) {
1169 last_dest = vp->mount();
1170 }
1171
1172 // Prioritize last found path, then seats
1173 // Don't change spots if ours is nice
1174 int my_spot = -1;
1175 std::vector<std::pair<int, int> > seats;
1176 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_avail_parts( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE ) ) {
1177 const player *passenger = veh->get_passenger( vp.part_index() );
1178 if( passenger != this && passenger != nullptr ) {
1179 continue;
1180 }
1181
1182 // a seat is available if either unassigned or assigned to us
1183 auto available_seat = [&]( const vehicle_part & pt ) {
1184 if( !pt.is_seat() ) {
1185 return false;
1186 }
1187 const npc *who = pt.crew();
1188 return !who || who->getID() == getID();
1189 };
1190
1191 const vehicle_part &pt = vp.part();
1192
1193 int priority = 0;
1194
1195 if( vp.mount() == last_dest ) {
1196 // Shares mount point with last known path
1197 // We probably wanted to go there in the last turn
1198 priority = 4;
1199
1200 } else if( available_seat( pt ) ) {
1201 // Assuming player "owns" a sensible vehicle seats should be in good spots to occupy
1202 // Prefer our assigned seat if we have one
1203 const npc *who = pt.crew();
1204 priority = who && who->getID() == getID() ? 3 : 2;
1205
1206 } else if( vp.is_inside() ) {
1207 priority = 1;
1208 }
1209
1210 if( passenger == this ) {
1211 my_spot = priority;
1212 }
1213
1214 seats.push_back( std::make_pair( priority, static_cast<int>( vp.part_index() ) ) );
1215 }
1216
1217 if( my_spot >= 3 ) {
1218 // We won't get any better, so don't try
1219 move_pause();
1220 break;
1221 }
1222
1223 std::sort( seats.begin(), seats.end(),
1224 []( const std::pair<int, int> &l, const std::pair<int, int> &r ) {
1225 return l.first > r.first;
1226 } );
1227
1228 if( seats.empty() ) {
1229 // TODO: be angry at player, switch to wait or leave - for now pause
1230 move_pause();
1231 break;
1232 }
1233
1234 // Only check few best seats - pathfinding can get expensive
1235 const size_t try_max = std::min<size_t>( 4, seats.size() );
1236 for( size_t i = 0; i < try_max; i++ ) {
1237 if( seats[i].first <= my_spot ) {
1238 // We have a nicer spot than this
1239 // Note: this will make NPCs steal player's seat...
1240 break;
1241 }
1242
1243 const int cur_part = seats[i].second;
1244
1245 tripoint pp = veh->global_part_pos3( cur_part );
1246 update_path( pp, true );
1247 if( !path.empty() ) {
1248 // All is fine
1249 move_to_next();
1250 break;
1251 }
1252 }
1253
1254 // TODO: Check the rest
1255 move_pause();
1256 }
1257
1258 break;
1259 case npc_talk_to_player:
1260 talk_to_u();
1261 moves = 0;
1262 break;
1263
1264 case npc_mug_player:
1265 mug_player( player_character );
1266 break;
1267
1268 case npc_goto_destination:
1269 go_to_omt_destination();
1270 break;
1271
1272 case npc_avoid_friendly_fire:
1273 avoid_friendly_fire();
1274 break;
1275
1276 case npc_escape_explosion:
1277 escape_explosion();
1278 break;
1279
1280 case npc_player_activity:
1281 do_player_activity();
1282 break;
1283
1284 case npc_undecided:
1285 complain();
1286 move_pause();
1287 break;
1288
1289 case npc_noop:
1290 add_msg( m_debug, "%s skips turn (noop)", disp_name() );
1291 return;
1292
1293 default:
1294 debugmsg( "Unknown NPC action (%d)", action );
1295 }
1296
1297 if( oldmoves == moves ) {
1298 add_msg( m_debug, "NPC didn't use its moves. Action %s (%d).",
1299 npc_action_name( action ), action );
1300 }
1301}
1302
1303npc_action npc::method_of_fleeing()
1304{
1305 if( in_vehicle ) {
1306 return npc_undecided;
1307 }
1308 return npc_flee;
1309}
1310
1311npc_action npc::method_of_attack()
1312{
1313 Creature *critter = current_target();
1314 if( critter == nullptr ) {
1315 // This function shouldn't be called...
1316 debugmsg( "Ran npc::method_of_attack without a target!" );
1317 return npc_pause;
1318 }
1319
1320 tripoint tar = critter->pos();
1321 int dist = rl_dist( pos(), tar );
1322 double danger = evaluate_enemy( *critter );
1323 const bool has_los = clear_shot_reach( pos(), tar, false );
1324 const bool same_z = tar.z == pos().z;
1325
1326 // TODO: Change the in_vehicle check to actual "are we driving" check
1327 const bool dont_move = in_vehicle || rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NO_MOVE ||
1328 rules.engagement == combat_engagement::FREE_FIRE;
1329 // NPCs engage in free fire can move to avoid allies, but not if they're in a vehicle
1330 const bool dont_move_ff = in_vehicle || rules.engagement == combat_engagement::NO_MOVE;
1331
1332 // if there's enough of a threat to be here, power up the combat CBMs
1333 activate_combat_cbms();
1334
1335 int ups_charges = charges_of( itype_UPS );
1336
1337 // get any suitable modes excluding melee, any forbidden to NPCs and those without ammo
1338 // if we require a silent weapon inappropriate modes are also removed
1339 // except in emergency only fire bursts if danger > 0.5 and don't shoot at all at harmless targets
1340 std::vector<std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode>> modes;
1341 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::use_guns ) || !is_player_ally() ) {
1342 for( const auto &e : weapon.gun_all_modes() ) {
1343 modes.push_back( e );
1344 }
1345
1346 modes.erase( std::remove_if( modes.begin(), modes.end(),
1347 [&]( const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &e ) {
1348
1349 const auto &m = e.second;
1350 return m.melee() || m.flags.count( "NPC_AVOID" ) ||
1351 !m->ammo_sufficient( m.qty ) || !can_use( *m.target ) ||
1352 m->get_gun_ups_drain() > ups_charges ||
1353 ( ( danger <= ( m.qty == 1 ? 3.0 : 15.0 ) ) && !emergency() ) ||
1354 ( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::use_silent ) && is_player_ally() &&
1355 !m.target->is_silent() );
1356
1357 } ), modes.end() );
1358 }
1359
1360 // prefer modes that result in more total damage
1361 std::stable_sort( modes.begin(),
1362 modes.end(), [&]( const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &lhs,
1363 const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &rhs ) {
1364 return ( lhs.second->gun_damage().total_damage() * lhs.second.qty ) >
1365 ( rhs.second->gun_damage().total_damage() * rhs.second.qty );
1366 } );
1367
1368 const int cur_recoil = recoil_total();
1369 // modes outside confident range should always be the last option(s)
1370 std::stable_sort( modes.begin(),
1371 modes.end(), [&]( const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &lhs,
1372 const std::pair<gun_mode_id, gun_mode> &rhs ) {
1373 return ( confident_gun_mode_range( lhs.second, cur_recoil ) >= dist ) >
1374 ( confident_gun_mode_range( rhs.second, cur_recoil ) >= dist );
1375 } );
1376
1377 if( emergency() && alt_attack() ) {
1378 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying an alternate attack", disp_name() );
1379 return npc_noop;
1380 }
1381
1382 // reach attacks are silent and consume no ammo so prefer these if available
1383 int reach_range = weapon.reach_range( *this );
1384 if( !trigdist ) {
1385 if( reach_range > 1 && reach_range >= dist && clear_shot_reach( pos(), tar ) ) {
1386 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying a reach attack", disp_name() );
1387 return npc_reach_attack;
1388 }
1389 } else {
1390 if( reach_range > 1 && reach_range >= std::round( trig_dist( pos(), tar ) ) &&
1391 clear_shot_reach( pos(), tar ) ) {
1392 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying a reach attack", disp_name() );
1393 return npc_reach_attack;
1394 }
1395 }
1396
1397 // if the best mode is within the confident range try for a shot
1398 if( !modes.empty() && sees( *critter ) && has_los &&
1399 confident_gun_mode_range( modes[ 0 ].second, cur_recoil ) >= dist ) {
1400 if( cbm_weapon_index > 0 && !weapon.ammo_sufficient() && can_reload_current() ) {
1401 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is reloading", disp_name() );
1402 return npc_reload;
1403 }
1404
1405 if( wont_hit_friend( tar, weapon, false ) ) {
1406 weapon.gun_set_mode( modes[ 0 ].first );
1407 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying to shoot someone", disp_name() );
1408 return npc_shoot;
1409
1410 } else {
1411 if( !dont_move_ff ) {
1412 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying to avoid friendly fire", disp_name() );
1413 return npc_avoid_friendly_fire;
1414 }
1415 }
1416 }
1417
1418 if( dist == 1 && same_z ) {
1419 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is trying a melle attack", disp_name() );
1420 return npc_melee;
1421 }
1422
1423 // don't mess with CBM weapons
1424 if( cbm_weapon_index < 0 ) {
1425 // TODO: Add a time check now that wielding takes a lot of time
1426 if( wield_better_weapon() ) {
1427 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is changing weapons", disp_name() );
1428 return npc_noop;
1429 }
1430
1431 if( !weapon.ammo_sufficient() && can_reload_current() ) {
1432 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is reloading", disp_name() );
1433 return npc_reload;
1434 }
1435 }
1436
1437 // TODO: Needs a check for transparent but non-passable tiles on the way
1438 if( !modes.empty() && sees( *critter ) && aim_per_move( weapon, recoil ) > 0 &&
1439 confident_shoot_range( weapon, get_most_accurate_sight( weapon ) ) >= dist ) {
1440 add_msg( m_debug, "%s is aiming" );
1441 return npc_aim;
1442 }
1443 add_msg( m_debug, "%s can't figure out what to do", disp_name() );
1444 return ( dont_move || !same_z ) ? npc_undecided : npc_melee;
1445}
1446
1447npc_action npc::address_needs()
1448{
1449 return address_needs( ai_cache.danger );
1450}
1451
1452static bool wants_to_reload( const npc &who, const item &it )
1453{
1454 if( !who.can_reload( it ) ) {
1455 return false;
1456 }
1457
1458 const int required = it.ammo_required();
1459 // TODO: Add bandolier check here, once they can be reloaded
1460 if( required < 1 && !it.is_magazine() ) {
1461 return false;
1462 }
1463
1464 const int remaining = it.ammo_remaining();
1465 return remaining < required || remaining < it.ammo_capacity();
1466}
1467
1468static bool wants_to_reload_with( const item &weap, const item &ammo )
1469{
1470 return !ammo.is_magazine() || ammo.ammo_remaining() > weap.ammo_remaining();
1471}
1472
1473item &npc::find_reloadable()
1474{
1475 auto cached_value = cached_info.find( "reloadables" );
1476 if( cached_value != cached_info.end() ) {
1477 return null_item_reference();
1478 }
1479 // Check wielded gun, non-wielded guns, mags and tools
1480 // TODO: Build a proper gun->mag->ammo DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph)
1481 // to avoid checking same properties over and over
1482 // TODO: Make this understand bandoliers, pouches etc.
1483 // TODO: Cache items checked for reloading to avoid re-checking same items every turn
1484 // TODO: Make it understand smaller and bigger magazines
1485 item *reloadable = nullptr;
1486 visit_items( [this, &reloadable]( item * node ) {
1487 if( !wants_to_reload( *this, *node ) ) {
1488 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
1489 }
1490 const auto it_loc = select_ammo( *node ).ammo;
1491 if( it_loc && wants_to_reload_with( *node, *it_loc ) ) {
1492 reloadable = node;
1493 return VisitResponse::ABORT;
1494 }
1495
1496 return VisitResponse::NEXT;
1497 } );
1498
1499 if( reloadable != nullptr ) {
1500 return *reloadable;
1501 }
1502
1503 cached_info.emplace( "reloadables", 0.0 );
1504 return null_item_reference();
1505}
1506
1507const item &npc::find_reloadable() const
1508{
1509 return const_cast<const item &>( const_cast<npc *>( this )->find_reloadable() );
1510}
1511
1512bool npc::can_reload_current()
1513{
1514 if( !weapon.is_gun() || !wants_to_reload( *this, weapon ) ) {
1515 return false;
1516 }
1517
1518 return static_cast<bool>( find_usable_ammo( weapon ) );
1519}
1520
1521item_location npc::find_usable_ammo( const item &weap )
1522{
1523 if( !can_reload( weap ) ) {
1524 return item_location();
1525 }
1526
1527 auto loc = select_ammo( weap ).ammo;
1528 if( !loc || !wants_to_reload_with( weap, *loc ) ) {
1529 return item_location();
1530 }
1531
1532 return loc;
1533}
1534
1535item_location npc::find_usable_ammo( const item &weap ) const
1536{
1537 return const_cast<npc *>( this )->find_usable_ammo( weap );
1538}
1539
1540void npc::adjust_power_cbms()
1541{
1542 if( !is_player_ally() || wants_to_recharge_cbm() ) {
1543 return;
1544 }
1545 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : power_cbms ) {
1546 deactivate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1547 }
1548}
1549
1550void npc::activate_combat_cbms()
1551{
1552 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : defense_cbms ) {
1553 activate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1554 }
1555 if( can_use_offensive_cbm() ) {
1556 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : weapon_cbms ) {
1557 check_or_use_weapon_cbm( cbm_id );
1558 }
1559 }
1560}
1561
1562void npc::deactivate_combat_cbms()
1563{
1564 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : defense_cbms ) {
1565 deactivate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1566 }
1567 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_hydraulics );
1568 for( const bionic_id &cbm_id : weapon_cbms ) {
1569 deactivate_bionic_by_id( cbm_id );
1570 }
1571 cbm_weapon_index = -1;
1572}
1573
1574bool npc::activate_bionic_by_id( const bionic_id &cbm_id, bool eff_only )
1575{
1576 int index = 0;
1577 for( const bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
1578 if( i.id == cbm_id ) {
1579 if( !i.powered ) {
1580 return activate_bionic( index, eff_only );
1581 } else {
1582 return false;
1583 }
1584 }
1585 index += 1;
1586 }
1587 return false;
1588}
1589
1590bool npc::use_bionic_by_id( const bionic_id &cbm_id, bool eff_only )
1591{
1592 int index = 0;
1593 for( const bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
1594 if( i.id == cbm_id ) {
1595 if( !i.powered ) {
1596 return activate_bionic( index, eff_only );
1597 } else {
1598 return true;
1599 }
1600 }
1601 index += 1;
1602 }
1603 return false;
1604}
1605
1606bool npc::deactivate_bionic_by_id( const bionic_id &cbm_id, bool eff_only )
1607{
1608 int index = 0;
1609 for( const bionic &i : *my_bionics ) {
1610 if( i.id == cbm_id ) {
1611 if( i.powered ) {
1612 return deactivate_bionic( index, eff_only );
1613 } else {
1614 return false;
1615 }
1616 }
1617 index += 1;
1618 }
1619 return false;
1620}
1621
1622bool npc::wants_to_recharge_cbm()
1623{
1624 const units::energy curr_power = get_power_level();
1625 const float allowed_ratio = static_cast<int>( rules.cbm_recharge ) / 100.0f;
1626 const units::energy max_pow_allowed = get_max_power_level() * allowed_ratio;
1627
1628 if( curr_power < max_pow_allowed ) {
1629 for( const bionic_id &bid : get_fueled_bionics() ) {
1630 if( !has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {
1631 return true;
1632 }
1633 }
1634 return get_fueled_bionics().empty(); //NPC might have power CBM that doesn't use the json fuel_opts entry
1635 }
1636 return false;
1637}
1638
1639bool npc::can_use_offensive_cbm() const
1640{
1641 const float allowed_ratio = static_cast<int>( rules.cbm_reserve ) / 100.0f;
1642 return get_power_level() > get_max_power_level() * allowed_ratio;
1643}
1644
1645bool npc::consume_cbm_items( const std::function<bool( const item & )> &filter )
1646{
1647 invslice slice = inv.slice();
1648 int index = -1;
1649 for( size_t i = 0; i < slice.size(); i++ ) {
1650 const item &it = slice[i]->front();
1651 const item &real_item = it.is_container() ? it.contents.front() : it;
1652 if( filter( real_item ) ) {
1653 index = i;
1654 break;
1655 }
1656 }
1657 if( index < 0 ) {
1658 return false;
1659 }
1660 int old_moves = moves;
1661 item_location loc = item_location( *this, &i_at( index ) );
1662 return consume( loc ) && old_moves != moves;
1663}
1664
1665bool npc::recharge_cbm()
1666{
1667 // non-allied NPCs don't consume resources to recharge
1668 if( !is_player_ally() ) {
1669 mod_power_level( get_max_power_level() );
1670 return true;
1671 }
1672
1673 for( bionic_id &bid : get_fueled_bionics() ) {
1674 if( has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {
1675 continue;
1676 }
1677
1678 if( !get_fuel_available( bid ).empty() ) {
1679 use_bionic_by_id( bid );
1680 return true;
1681 } else {
1682 const std::function<bool( const item & )> fuel_filter = [bid]( const item & it ) {
1683 for( const itype_id &fid : bid->fuel_opts ) {
1684 return it.typeId() == fid || ( !it.is_container_empty() && it.contents.front().typeId() == fid );
1685 }
1686 return false;
1687 };
1688
1689 if( consume_cbm_items( fuel_filter ) ) {
1690 use_bionic_by_id( bid );
1691 return true;
1692 } else {
1693 const std::vector<itype_id> fuel_op = bid->fuel_opts;
1694 const bool need_alcohol =
1695 std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_chem_ethanol ) !=
1696 fuel_op.end() ||
1697 std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_chem_methanol ) !=
1698 fuel_op.end() ||
1699 std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_denat_alcohol ) !=
1700 fuel_op.end();
1701
1702 if( std::find( fuel_op.begin(), fuel_op.end(), itype_battery ) != fuel_op.end() ) {
1703 complain_about( "need_batteries", 3_hours, "<need_batteries>", false );
1704 } else if( need_alcohol ) {
1705 complain_about( "need_booze", 3_hours, "<need_booze>", false );
1706 } else {
1707 complain_about( "need_fuel", 3_hours, "<need_fuel>", false );
1708 }
1709 }
1710 }
1711 }
1712
1713 if( use_bionic_by_id( bio_furnace ) ) {
1714 const std::function<bool( const item & )> furnace_filter = []( const item & it ) {
1715 return it.typeId() == itype_id( "withered" ) || it.typeId() == itype_id( "file" ) ||
1716 it.has_flag( "FIREWOOD" );
1717 };
1718 if( consume_cbm_items( furnace_filter ) ) {
1719 return true;
1720 } else {
1721 complain_about( "need_junk", 3_hours, "<need_junk>", false );
1722 }
1723 }
1724
1725 if( use_bionic_by_id( bio_reactor ) || use_bionic_by_id( bio_advreactor ) ) {
1726 const std::function<bool( const item & )> reactor_filter = []( const item & it ) {
1727 return it.is_ammo() && ( it.ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ||
1728 it.ammo_type() == ammo_reactor_slurry );
1729 };
1730 if( consume_cbm_items( reactor_filter ) ) {
1731 return true;
1732 } else {
1733 complain_about( "need_radioactives", 3_hours, "<need_radioactives>", false );
1734 }
1735 }
1736
1737 return false;
1738}
1739
1740healing_options npc::patient_assessment( const Character &c )
1741{
1742 healing_options try_to_fix;
1743 try_to_fix.clear_all();
1744
1745 for( const std::pair<const bodypart_str_id, bodypart> &elem : c.get_body() ) {
1746
1747 if( c.has_effect( effect_bleed, elem.first->token ) ) {
1748 try_to_fix.bleed = true;
1749 }
1750
1751 if( c.has_effect( effect_bite, elem.first->token ) ) {
1752 try_to_fix.bite = true;
1753 }
1754
1755 if( c.has_effect( effect_infected, elem.first->token ) ) {
1756 try_to_fix.infect = true;
1757 }
1758 int part_threshold = 75;
1759 if( elem.first == bodypart_str_id( "head" ) ) {
1760 part_threshold += 20;
1761 } else if( elem.first == bodypart_str_id( "torso" ) ) {
1762 part_threshold += 10;
1763 }
1764 part_threshold = std::min( 80, part_threshold );
1765 part_threshold = part_threshold * elem.second.get_hp_max() / 100;
1766
1767 if( elem.second.get_hp_cur() <= part_threshold ) {
1768 if( !c.has_effect( effect_bandaged, elem.first->token ) ) {
1769 try_to_fix.bandage = true;
1770 }
1771 if( !c.has_effect( effect_disinfected, elem.first->token ) ) {
1772 try_to_fix.disinfect = true;
1773 }
1774 }
1775 }
1776 return try_to_fix;
1777}
1778
1779npc_action npc::address_needs( float danger )
1780{
1781 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1782 // rng because NPCs are not meant to be hypervigilant hawks that notice everything
1783 // and swing into action with alarming alacrity.
1784 // no sometimes they are just looking the other way, sometimes they hestitate.
1785 // ( also we can get huge performance boosts )
1786 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1787 healing_options try_to_fix_me = patient_assessment( *this );
1788 if( try_to_fix_me.any_true() ) {
1789 if( !use_bionic_by_id( bio_nanobots ) ) {
1790 ai_cache.can_heal = has_healing_options( try_to_fix_me );
1791 if( ai_cache.can_heal.any_true() ) {
1792 return npc_heal;
1793 }
1794 }
1795 } else {
1796 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_nanobots );
1797 }
1798 if( get_skill_level( skill_firstaid ) > 0 ) {
1799 if( is_player_ally() ) {
1800 healing_options try_to_fix_other = patient_assessment( player_character );
1801 if( try_to_fix_other.any_true() ) {
1802 ai_cache.can_heal = has_healing_options( try_to_fix_other );
1803 if( ai_cache.can_heal.any_true() ) {
1804 ai_cache.ally = g->shared_from( player_character );
1805 return npc_heal_player;
1806 }
1807 }
1808 }
1809 for( const npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
1810 if( &guy == this || !guy.is_ally( *this ) || guy.posz() != posz() || !sees( guy ) ) {
1811 continue;
1812 }
1813 healing_options try_to_fix_other = patient_assessment( guy );
1814 if( try_to_fix_other.any_true() ) {
1815 ai_cache.can_heal = has_healing_options( try_to_fix_other );
1816 if( ai_cache.can_heal.any_true() ) {
1817 ai_cache.ally = g->shared_from( guy );
1818 return npc_heal_player;
1819 }
1820 }
1821 }
1822 }
1823 }
1824
1825 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1826 if( get_perceived_pain() >= 15 ) {
1827 if( !activate_bionic_by_id( bio_painkiller ) && has_painkiller() && !took_painkiller() ) {
1828 return npc_use_painkiller;
1829 }
1830 } else {
1831 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_painkiller );
1832 }
1833 }
1834
1835 if( one_in( 3 ) && can_reload_current() ) {
1836 return npc_reload;
1837 }
1838
1839 item &reloadable = find_reloadable();
1840 if( !reloadable.is_null() ) {
1841 do_reload( reloadable );
1842 return npc_noop;
1843 }
1844
1845 // Extreme thirst or hunger, bypass safety check.
1846 if( get_thirst() > thirst_levels::dehydrated ||
1847 get_stored_kcal() + stomach.get_calories() < max_stored_kcal() * 0.75 ) {
1848 if( consume_food_from_camp() ) {
1849 return npc_noop;
1850 }
1851 if( consume_food() ) {
1852 return npc_noop;
1853 }
1854 }
1855 //Does the hallucination needs to disappear ?
1856 if( is_hallucination() && player_character.sees( *this ) ) {
1857 if( !player_character.has_effect( effect_hallu ) ) {
1858 die( nullptr );
1859 }
1860 }
1861
1862 if( danger > NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW ) {
1863 return npc_undecided;
1864 }
1865
1866 if( one_in( 3 ) && ( get_thirst() > thirst_levels::thirsty ||
1867 get_stored_kcal() + stomach.get_calories() < max_stored_kcal() * 0.95 ) ) {
1868 if( consume_food_from_camp() ) {
1869 return npc_noop;
1870 }
1871 if( consume_food() ) {
1872 return npc_noop;
1873 }
1874 }
1875
1876 if( one_in( 3 ) && wants_to_recharge_cbm() && recharge_cbm() ) {
1877 return npc_noop;
1878 }
1879
1880 if( one_in( 3 ) && find_corpse_to_pulp() ) {
1881 if( !do_pulp() ) {
1882 move_to_next();
1883 }
1884 return npc_noop;
1885 }
1886
1887 if( one_in( 3 ) && adjust_worn() ) {
1888 return npc_noop;
1889 }
1890
1891 const auto could_sleep = [&]() {
1892 if( danger <= 0.01 ) {
1893 if( get_fatigue() >= fatigue_levels::tired ) {
1894 return true;
1895 } else if( is_walking_with() && player_character.in_sleep_state() &&
1896 get_fatigue() > ( fatigue_levels::tired / 2 ) ) {
1897 return true;
1898 }
1899 }
1900 return false;
1901 };
1902 // TODO: More risky attempts at sleep when exhausted
1903 if( one_in( 3 ) && could_sleep() ) {
1904 if( !is_player_ally() ) {
1905 // TODO: Make tired NPCs handle sleep offscreen
1906 set_fatigue( 0 );
1907 return npc_undecided;
1908 }
1909
1910 if( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::allow_sleep ) || get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::massive ) {
1911 return npc_sleep;
1912 } else if( player_character.in_sleep_state() ) {
1913 // TODO: "Guard me while I sleep" command
1914 return npc_sleep;
1915 }
1916 }
1917 // TODO: Mutation & trait related needs
1918 // e.g. finding glasses; getting out of sunlight if we're an albino; etc.
1919
1920 return npc_undecided;
1921}
1922
1923npc_action npc::address_player()
1924{
1925 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1926 if( ( attitude == NPCATT_TALK ) && sees( player_character ) ) {
1927 if( player_character.in_sleep_state() ) {
1928 // Leave sleeping characters alone.
1929 return npc_undecided;
1930 }
1931 if( rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) <= 6 ) {
1932 return npc_talk_to_player; // Close enough to talk to you
1933 } else {
1934 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
1935 say( "<lets_talk>" );
1936 }
1937 return npc_follow_player;
1938 }
1939 }
1940
1941 if( attitude == NPCATT_MUG && sees( player_character ) ) {
1942 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
1943 say( _( "Don't move a <swear> muscle…" ) );
1944 }
1945 return npc_mug_player;
1946 }
1947
1948 if( attitude == NPCATT_WAIT_FOR_LEAVE ) {
1949 patience--;
1950 if( patience <= 0 ) {
1951 patience = 0;
1952 set_attitude( NPCATT_KILL );
1953 return npc_noop;
1954 }
1955 return npc_undecided;
1956 }
1957
1958 if( attitude == NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP ) {
1959 return npc_flee;
1960 }
1961
1962 if( attitude == NPCATT_LEAD ) {
1963 if( rl_dist( pos(), player_character.pos() ) >= 12 || !sees( player_character ) ) {
1964 int intense = get_effect_int( effect_catch_up );
1965 if( intense < 10 ) {
1966 say( "<keep_up>" );
1967 add_effect( effect_catch_up, 5_turns );
1968 return npc_pause;
1969 } else {
1970 say( "<im_leaving_you>" );
1971 set_attitude( NPCATT_NULL );
1972 return npc_pause;
1973 }
1974 } else if( has_omt_destination() ) {
1975 return npc_goto_destination;
1976 } else { // At goal. Now, waiting on nearby player
1977 return npc_pause;
1978 }
1979 }
1980 return npc_undecided;
1981}
1982
1983npc_action npc::long_term_goal_action()
1984{
1985 add_msg( m_debug, "long_term_goal_action()" );
1986
1987 if( mission == NPC_MISSION_SHOPKEEP || mission == NPC_MISSION_SHELTER || ( is_player_ally() &&
1988 mission != NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING ) ) {
1989 return npc_pause; // Shopkeepers just stay put.
1990 }
1991
1992 if( !has_omt_destination() ) {
1993 set_omt_destination();
1994 }
1995
1996 if( has_omt_destination() ) {
1997 if( mission != NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING ) {
1998 set_mission( NPC_MISSION_TRAVELLING );
1999 set_attitude( attitude );
2000 }
2001 return npc_goto_destination;
2002 }
2003
2004 return npc_undecided;
2005}
2006
2007double npc::confidence_mult() const
2008{
2009 if( !is_player_ally() ) {
2010 return 1.0f;
2011 }
2012
2013 switch( rules.aim ) {
2014 case aim_rule::WHEN_CONVENIENT:
2015 return emergency() ? 1.5f : 1.0f;
2016 case aim_rule::SPRAY:
2017 return 2.0f;
2018 case aim_rule::PRECISE:
2019 return emergency() ? 1.0f : 0.75f;
2020 case aim_rule::STRICTLY_PRECISE:
2021 return 0.5f;
2022 }
2023
2024 return 1.0f;
2025}
2026
2027int npc::confident_shoot_range( const item &it, int recoil ) const
2028{
2029 int res = 0;
2030 if( !it.is_gun() ) {
2031 return res;
2032 }
2033 if( confident_range_cache ) {
2034 return *confident_range_cache;
2035 }
2036 for( const auto &m : it.gun_all_modes() ) {
2037 res = std::max( res, confident_gun_mode_range( m.second, recoil ) );
2038 }
2039 return res;
2040}
2041
2042int npc::confident_gun_mode_range( const gun_mode &gun, int at_recoil ) const
2043{
2044 if( !gun || gun.melee() ) {
2045 return 0;
2046 }
2047
2048 // Same calculation as in @ref item::info
2049 // TODO: Extract into common method
2050 double max_dispersion = get_weapon_dispersion( *( gun.target ) ).max() + at_recoil;
2051 double even_chance_range = range_with_even_chance_of_good_hit( max_dispersion );
2052 double confident_range = even_chance_range * confidence_mult();
2053 add_msg( m_debug, "confident_gun (%s<=%.2f) at %.1f", gun.name(), confident_range,
2054 max_dispersion );
2055 return std::max<int>( confident_range, 1 );
2056}
2057
2058int npc::confident_throw_range( const item &thrown, Creature *target ) const
2059{
2060 double average_dispersion = ranged::throwing_dispersion( *this, thrown, target, false ) / 2.0;
2061 double even_chance_range = ( target == nullptr ? 0.5 : target->ranged_target_size() ) /
2062 average_dispersion;
2063 double confident_range = even_chance_range * confidence_mult();
2064 add_msg( m_debug, "confident_throw_range == %d", static_cast<int>( confident_range ) );
2065 return static_cast<int>( confident_range );
2066}
2067
2068// Index defaults to -1, i.e., wielded weapon
2069bool npc::wont_hit_friend( const tripoint &tar, const item &it, bool throwing ) const
2070{
2071 // TODO: Get actual dispersion instead of extracting it (badly) from confident range
2072 int confident = throwing ?
2073 confident_throw_range( it, nullptr ) :
2074 confident_shoot_range( it, recoil_total() );
2075 // if there is no confidence at using weapon, it's not used at range
2076 // zero confidence leads to divide by zero otherwise
2077 if( confident < 1 ) {
2078 return true;
2079 }
2080
2081 if( rl_dist( pos(), tar ) == 1 ) {
2082 return true; // If we're *really* sure that our aim is dead-on
2083 }
2084
2085 units::angle target_angle = coord_to_angle( pos(), tar );
2086
2087 // TODO: Base on dispersion
2088 units::angle safe_angle = 30_degrees;
2089
2090 for( const auto &fr : ai_cache.friends ) {
2091 const shared_ptr_fast<Creature> ally_p = fr.lock();
2092 if( !ally_p ) {
2093 continue;
2094 }
2095 const Creature &ally = *ally_p;
2096
2097 // TODO: Extract common functions with turret target selection
2098 units::angle safe_angle_ally = safe_angle;
2099 int ally_dist = rl_dist( pos(), ally.pos() );
2100 if( ally_dist < 3 ) {
2101 safe_angle_ally += ( 3 - ally_dist ) * 30_degrees;
2102 }
2103
2104 units::angle ally_angle = coord_to_angle( pos(), ally.pos() );
2105 units::angle angle_diff = units::fabs( ally_angle - target_angle );
2106 angle_diff = std::min( 360_degrees - angle_diff, angle_diff );
2107 if( angle_diff < safe_angle_ally ) {
2108 // TODO: Disable NPC whining is it's other NPC who prevents aiming
2109 return false;
2110 }
2111 }
2112
2113 return true;
2114}
2115
2116bool npc::enough_time_to_reload( const item &gun ) const
2117{
2118 int rltime = item_reload_cost( gun, item( gun.ammo_default() ),
2119 gun.ammo_capacity() );
2120 const float turns_til_reloaded = static_cast<float>( rltime ) / get_speed();
2121
2122 const Creature *target = current_target();
2123 if( target == nullptr ) {
2124 // No target, plenty of time to reload
2125 return true;
2126 }
2127
2128 const auto distance = rl_dist( pos(), target->pos() );
2129 const float target_speed = target->speed_rating();
2130 const float turns_til_reached = distance / target_speed;
2131 if( target->is_player() || target->is_npc() ) {
2132 auto &c = dynamic_cast<const Character &>( *target );
2133 // TODO: Allow reloading if the player has a low accuracy gun
2134 if( sees( c ) && c.weapon.is_gun() && rltime > 200 &&
2135 c.weapon.gun_range( true ) > distance + turns_til_reloaded / target_speed ) {
2136 // Don't take longer than 2 turns if player has a gun
2137 return false;
2138 }
2139 }
2140
2141 // TODO: Handle monsters with ranged attacks and players with CBMs
2142 return turns_til_reloaded < turns_til_reached;
2143}
2144
2145void npc::aim()
2146{
2147 double aim_amount = aim_per_move( weapon, recoil );
2148 while( aim_amount > 0 && recoil > 0 && moves > 0 ) {
2149 moves--;
2150 recoil -= aim_amount;
2151 recoil = std::max( 0.0, recoil );
2152 aim_amount = aim_per_move( weapon, recoil );
2153 }
2154}
2155
2156bool npc::update_path( const tripoint &p, const bool no_bashing, bool force )
2157{
2158 if( p == pos() ) {
2159 path.clear();
2160 return true;
2161 }
2162
2163 while( !path.empty() && path[0] == pos() ) {
2164 path.erase( path.begin() );
2165 }
2166
2167 if( !path.empty() ) {
2168 const tripoint &last = path[path.size() - 1];
2169 if( last == p && ( path[0].z != posz() || rl_dist( path[0], pos() ) <= 1 ) ) {
2170 // Our path already leads to that point, no need to recalculate
2171 return true;
2172 }
2173 }
2174
2175 auto new_path = get_map().route( pos(), p, get_pathfinding_settings( no_bashing ),
2176 get_path_avoid() );
2177 if( new_path.empty() ) {
2178 if( !ai_cache.sound_alerts.empty() ) {
2179 ai_cache.sound_alerts.erase( ai_cache.sound_alerts.begin() );
2180 add_msg( m_debug, "failed to path to sound alert %d,%d,%d->%d,%d,%d",
2181 posx(), posy(), posz(), p.x, p.y, p.z );
2182 }
2183 add_msg( m_debug, "Failed to path %d,%d,%d->%d,%d,%d",
2184 posx(), posy(), posz(), p.x, p.y, p.z );
2185 }
2186
2187 while( !new_path.empty() && new_path[0] == pos() ) {
2188 new_path.erase( new_path.begin() );
2189 }
2190
2191 if( !new_path.empty() || force ) {
2192 path = std::move( new_path );
2193 return true;
2194 }
2195
2196 return false;
2197}
2198
2199bool npc::can_open_door( const tripoint &p, const bool inside ) const
2200{
2201 return !rules.has_flag( ally_rule::avoid_doors ) && get_map().open_door( p, inside, true );
2202}
2203
2204bool npc::can_move_to( const tripoint &p, bool no_bashing ) const
2205{
2206 map &here = get_map();
2207 // Allow moving into any bashable spots, but penalize them during pathing
2208 // Doors are not passable for hallucinations
2209 return( rl_dist( pos(), p ) <= 1 && here.has_floor( p ) && !g->is_dangerous_tile( p ) &&
2210 ( here.passable( p ) || ( can_open_door( p, !here.is_outside( pos() ) ) && !is_hallucination() ) ||
2211 ( !no_bashing && here.bash_rating( smash_ability(), p ) > 0 ) )
2212 );
2213}
2214
2215void npc::move_to( const tripoint &pt, bool no_bashing, std::set<tripoint> *nomove )
2216{
2217 tripoint p = pt;
2218 map &here = get_map();
2219 if( sees_dangerous_field( p )
2220 || ( nomove != nullptr && nomove->find( p ) != nomove->end() ) ) {
2221 // Move to a neighbor field instead, if possible.
2222 // Maybe this code already exists somewhere?
2223 auto other_points = here.get_dir_circle( pos(), p );
2224 for( const tripoint &ot : other_points ) {
2225 if( could_move_onto( ot )
2226 && ( nomove == nullptr || nomove->find( ot ) == nomove->end() ) ) {
2227
2228 p = ot;
2229 break;
2230 }
2231 }
2232 }
2233
2234 recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
2235
2236 if( has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
2237 p.x = rng( posx() - 1, posx() + 1 );
2238 p.y = rng( posy() - 1, posy() + 1 );
2239 p.z = posz();
2240 }
2241
2242 // nomove is used to resolve recursive invocation, so reset destination no
2243 // matter it was changed by stunned effect or not.
2244 if( nomove != nullptr && nomove->find( p ) != nomove->end() ) {
2245 p = pos();
2246 }
2247
2248 // "Long steps" are allowed when crossing z-levels
2249 // Stairs teleport the player too
2250 if( rl_dist( pos(), p ) > 1 && p.z == posz() ) {
2251 // On the same level? Not so much. Something weird happened
2252 path.clear();
2253 move_pause();
2254 }
2255 bool attacking = false;
2256 if( g->critter_at<monster>( p ) ) {
2257 attacking = true;
2258 }
2259 if( !move_effects( attacking ) ) {
2260 mod_moves( -100 );
2261 return;
2262 }
2263
2264 Creature *critter = g->critter_at( p );
2265 if( critter != nullptr ) {
2266 if( critter == this ) { // We're just pausing!
2267 move_pause();
2268 return;
2269 }
2270 const auto att = attitude_to( *critter );
2271 if( att == A_HOSTILE ) {
2272 if( !no_bashing ) {
2273 warn_about( "cant_flee", 5_turns + rng( 0, 5 ) * 1_turns );
2274 melee_attack( *critter, true );
2275 } else {
2276 move_pause();
2277 }
2278
2279 return;
2280 }
2281
2282 if( critter->is_avatar() ) {
2283 say( "<let_me_pass>" );
2284 }
2285
2286 // Let NPCs push each other when non-hostile
2287 // TODO: Have them attack each other when hostile
2288 npc *np = dynamic_cast<npc *>( critter );
2289 if( np != nullptr && !np->in_sleep_state() ) {
2290 std::unique_ptr<std::set<tripoint>> newnomove;
2291 std::set<tripoint> *realnomove;
2292 if( nomove != nullptr ) {
2293 realnomove = nomove;
2294 } else {
2295 // create the no-move list
2296 newnomove = std::make_unique<std::set<tripoint>>();
2297 realnomove = newnomove.get();
2298 }
2299 // other npcs should not try to move into this npc anymore,
2300 // so infinite loop can be avoided.
2301 realnomove->insert( pos() );
2302 say( "<let_me_pass>" );
2303 np->move_away_from( pos(), true, realnomove );
2304 // if we moved NPC, readjust their path, so NPCs don't jostle each other out of their activity paths.
2305 if( np->attitude == NPCATT_ACTIVITY ) {
2306 std::vector<tripoint> activity_route = np->get_auto_move_route();
2307 if( !activity_route.empty() && !np->has_destination_activity() ) {
2308 tripoint final_destination;
2309 if( destination_point ) {
2310 final_destination = here.getlocal( *destination_point );
2311 } else {
2312 final_destination = activity_route.back();
2313 }
2314 np->update_path( final_destination );
2315 }
2316 }
2317 }
2318
2319 if( critter->pos() == p ) {
2320 move_pause();
2321 return;
2322 }
2323 }
2324
2325 // Boarding moving vehicles is fine, unboarding isn't
2326 bool moved = false;
2327 if( const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( pos() ) ) {
2328 const optional_vpart_position ovp = here.veh_at( p );
2329 if( vp->vehicle().is_moving() &&
2330 ( veh_pointer_or_null( ovp ) != veh_pointer_or_null( vp ) ||
2331 !ovp.part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, true ) ) ) {
2332 move_pause();
2333 return;
2334 }
2335 }
2336
2337 if( p.z != posz() ) {
2338 // Z-level move
2339 // For now just teleport to the destination
2340 // TODO: Make it properly find the tile to move to
2341 if( is_mounted() ) {
2342 move_pause();
2343 return;
2344 }
2345 moves -= 100;
2346 moved = true;
2347 } else if( here.passable( p ) && !here.has_flag( "DOOR", p ) ) {
2348 bool diag = trigdist && posx() != p.x && posy() != p.y;
2349 if( is_mounted() ) {
2350 const double base_moves = run_cost( here.combined_movecost( pos(), p ),
2351 diag ) * 100.0 / mounted_creature->get_speed();
2352 const double encumb_moves = get_weight() / 4800.0_gram;
2353 moves -= static_cast<int>( std::ceil( base_moves + encumb_moves ) );
2354 if( mounted_creature->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
2355 mounted_creature->use_mech_power( -1 );
2356 }
2357 } else {
2358 moves -= run_cost( here.combined_movecost( pos(), p ), diag );
2359 }
2360 moved = true;
2361 } else if( here.open_door( p, !here.is_outside( pos() ), true ) ) {
2362 if( !is_hallucination() ) { // hallucinations don't open doors
2363 here.open_door( p, !here.is_outside( pos() ) );
2364 moves -= 100;
2365 } else { // hallucinations teleport through doors
2366 moves -= 100;
2367 moved = true;
2368 }
2369 } else if( get_dex() > 1 && here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "CLIMBABLE", p ) ) {
2370 ///\EFFECT_DEX_NPC increases chance to climb CLIMBABLE furniture or terrain
2371 int climb = get_dex();
2372 if( one_in( climb ) ) {
2373 add_msg_if_npc( m_neutral, _( "%1$s tries to climb the %2$s but slips." ), name,
2374 here.tername( p ) );
2375 moves -= 400;
2376 } else {
2377 add_msg_if_npc( m_neutral, _( "%1$s climbs over the %2$s." ), name, here.tername( p ) );
2378 moves -= ( 500 - ( rng( 0, climb ) * 20 ) );
2379 moved = true;
2380 }
2381 } else if( !no_bashing && smash_ability() > 0 && here.is_bashable( p ) &&
2382 here.bash_rating( smash_ability(), p ) > 0 ) {
2383 moves -= !is_armed() ? 80 : weapon.attack_cost() * 0.8;
2384 here.bash( p, smash_ability() );
2385 } else {
2386 if( attitude == NPCATT_MUG ||
2387 attitude == NPCATT_KILL ||
2388 attitude == NPCATT_WAIT_FOR_LEAVE ) {
2389 set_attitude( NPCATT_FLEE_TEMP );
2390 }
2391
2392 moves = 0;
2393 }
2394
2395 if( moved ) {
2396 const tripoint old_pos = pos();
2397 setpos( p );
2398 if( old_pos.x - p.x < 0 ) {
2399 facing = FD_RIGHT;
2400 } else {
2401 facing = FD_LEFT;
2402 }
2403 if( is_mounted() ) {
2404 if( mounted_creature->pos() != pos() ) {
2405 mounted_creature->setpos( pos() );
2406 mounted_creature->facing = facing;
2407 mounted_creature->process_triggers();
2408 here.creature_in_field( *mounted_creature );
2409 here.creature_on_trap( *mounted_creature );
2410 }
2411 }
2412 if( here.has_flag( "UNSTABLE", pos() ) ) {
2413 add_effect( effect_bouldering, 1_turns, num_bp );
2414 } else if( has_effect( effect_bouldering ) ) {
2415 remove_effect( effect_bouldering );
2416 }
2417
2418 if( here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( TFLAG_NO_SIGHT, pos() ) ) {
2419 add_effect( effect_no_sight, 1_turns, num_bp );
2420 } else if( has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ) {
2421 remove_effect( effect_no_sight );
2422 }
2423
2424 if( in_vehicle ) {
2425 here.unboard_vehicle( old_pos );
2426 }
2427
2428 // Close doors behind self (if you can)
2429 if( ( rules.has_flag( ally_rule::close_doors ) && is_player_ally() ) && !is_hallucination() ) {
2430 doors::close_door( here, *this, old_pos );
2431 }
2432
2433 if( here.veh_at( p ).part_with_feature( VPFLAG_BOARDABLE, true ) ) {
2434 here.board_vehicle( p, this );
2435 }
2436
2437 here.creature_on_trap( *this );
2438 here.creature_in_field( *this );
2439 }
2440}
2441
2442void npc::move_to_next()
2443{
2444 while( !path.empty() && pos() == path[0] ) {
2445 path.erase( path.begin() );
2446 }
2447
2448 if( path.empty() ) {
2449 add_msg( m_debug, "npc::move_to_next() called with an empty path or path "
2450 "containing only current position" );
2451 move_pause();
2452 return;
2453 }
2454
2455 move_to( path[0] );
2456 if( !path.empty() && pos() == path[0] ) { // Move was successful
2457 path.erase( path.begin() );
2458 }
2459}
2460
2461void npc::avoid_friendly_fire()
2462{
2463 // TODO: To parameter
2464 const tripoint &tar = current_target()->pos();
2465 // Calculate center of weight of friends and move away from that
2466 tripoint center;
2467 for( const auto &fr : ai_cache.friends ) {
2468 if( shared_ptr_fast<Creature> fr_p = fr.lock() ) {
2469 center += fr_p->pos();
2470 }
2471 }
2472
2473 float friend_count = ai_cache.friends.size();
2474 center.x = std::round( center.x / friend_count );
2475 center.y = std::round( center.y / friend_count );
2476 center.z = std::round( center.z / friend_count );
2477
2478 std::vector<tripoint> candidates = closest_points_first( pos(), 1 );
2479 candidates.erase( candidates.begin() );
2480 std::sort( candidates.begin(), candidates.end(),
2481 [&tar, &center]( const tripoint & l, const tripoint & r ) {
2482 return ( rl_dist( l, tar ) - rl_dist( l, center ) ) <
2483 ( rl_dist( r, tar ) - rl_dist( r, center ) );
2484 } );
2485
2486 for( const auto &pt : candidates ) {
2487 if( can_move_to( pt ) ) {
2488 move_to( pt );
2489 return;
2490 }
2491 }
2492
2493 /* If we're still in the function at this point, maneuvering can't help us. So,
2494 * might as well address some needs.
2495 * We pass a <danger> value of NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW + 1 so that we won't start
2496 * eating food (or, god help us, sleeping).
2497 */
2498 npc_action action = address_needs( NPC_DANGER_VERY_LOW + 1 );
2499 if( action == npc_undecided ) {
2500 move_pause();
2501 }
2502 execute_action( action );
2503}
2504
2505void npc::escape_explosion()
2506{
2507 if( ai_cache.dangerous_explosives.empty() ) {
2508 return;
2509 }
2510
2511 warn_about( "explosion", 1_minutes );
2512
2513 move_away_from( ai_cache.dangerous_explosives, true );
2514}
2515
2516void npc::move_away_from( const tripoint &pt, bool no_bash_atk, std::set<tripoint> *nomove )
2517{
2518 tripoint best_pos = pos();
2519 int best = -1;
2520 int chance = 2;
2521 map &here = get_map();
2522 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
2523 if( nomove != nullptr && nomove->find( p ) != nomove->end() ) {
2524 continue;
2525 }
2526
2527 if( p == pos() ) {
2528 continue;
2529 }
2530
2531 if( p == get_player_character().pos() ) {
2532 continue;
2533 }
2534
2535 const int cost = here.combined_movecost( pos(), p );
2536 if( cost <= 0 ) {
2537 continue;
2538 }
2539
2540 const int dst = std::abs( p.x - pt.x ) + std::abs( p.y - pt.y ) + std::abs( p.z - pt.z );
2541 const int val = dst * 1000 / cost;
2542 if( val > best && can_move_to( p, no_bash_atk ) ) {
2543 best_pos = p;
2544 best = val;
2545 chance = 2;
2546 } else if( ( val == best && one_in( chance ) ) && can_move_to( p, no_bash_atk ) ) {
2547 best_pos = p;
2548 best = val;
2549 chance++;
2550 }
2551 }
2552
2553 move_to( best_pos, no_bash_atk, nomove );
2554}
2555
2556bool npc::find_job_to_perform()
2557{
2558 for( activity_id &elem : job.get_prioritised_vector() ) {
2559 if( job.get_priority_of_job( elem ) == 0 ) {
2560 continue;
2561 }
2562 player_activity scan_act = player_activity( elem );
2563 if( elem == activity_id( "ACT_MOVE_LOOT" ) ) {
2564 assign_activity( elem );
2565 } else if( generic_multi_activity_handler( scan_act, *this->as_player(), true ) ) {
2566 assign_activity( elem );
2567 return true;
2568 }
2569 }
2570 return false;
2571}
2572
2573void npc::worker_downtime()
2574{
2575 map &here = get_map();
2576 // are we already in a chair
2577 if( here.has_flag_furn( "CAN_SIT", pos() ) ) {
2578 // just chill here
2579 move_pause();
2580 return;
2581 }
2582 // already know of a chair, go there
2583 if( chair_pos != tripoint_min ) {
2584 if( here.has_flag_furn( "CAN_SIT", here.getlocal( chair_pos ) ) ) {
2585 update_path( here.getlocal( chair_pos ) );
2586 if( pos() == here.getlocal( chair_pos ) || path.empty() ) {
2587 move_pause();
2588 path.clear();
2589 } else {
2590 move_to_next();
2591 }
2592 wander_pos = tripoint_min;
2593 return;
2594 } else {
2595 chair_pos = tripoint_min;
2596 }
2597 } else {
2598 // find a chair
2599 if( !is_mounted() ) {
2600 for( const tripoint &elem : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 30 ) ) {
2601 if( here.has_flag_furn( "CAN_SIT", elem ) && !g->critter_at( elem ) && could_move_onto( elem ) &&
2602 here.point_within_camp( here.getabs( elem ) ) ) {
2603 // this one will do
2604 chair_pos = here.getabs( elem );
2605 return;
2606 }
2607 }
2608 }
2609 }
2610 // we got here if there are no chairs available.
2611 // wander back to near the bulletin board of the camp.
2612 if( wander_pos != tripoint_min ) {
2613 update_path( here.getlocal( wander_pos ) );
2614 if( pos() == here.getlocal( wander_pos ) || path.empty() ) {
2615 move_pause();
2616 path.clear();
2617 if( one_in( 30 ) ) {
2618 wander_pos = tripoint_min;
2619 }
2620 } else {
2621 move_to_next();
2622 }
2623 return;
2624 }
2625 if( assigned_camp ) {
2626 cata::optional<basecamp *> bcp = overmap_buffer.find_camp( ( *assigned_camp ).xy() );
2627 if( !bcp ) {
2628 assigned_camp = cata::nullopt;
2629 move_pause();
2630 return;
2631 }
2632 basecamp *temp_camp = *bcp;
2633 std::vector<tripoint> pts;
2634 for( const tripoint &elem : here.points_in_radius( here.getlocal( temp_camp->get_bb_pos() ),
2635 10 ) ) {
2636 if( g->critter_at( elem ) || !could_move_onto( elem ) || here.has_flag( TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, elem ) ||
2637 !here.has_floor( elem ) || g->is_dangerous_tile( elem ) ) {
2638 continue;
2639 }
2640 pts.push_back( elem );
2641 }
2642 if( !pts.empty() ) {
2643 wander_pos = here.getabs( random_entry( pts ) );
2644 return;
2645 }
2646 }
2647 move_pause();
2648}
2649
2650void npc::move_pause()
2651
2652{
2653 // make sure we're using the best weapon
2654 if( calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
2655 deactivate_bionic_by_id( bio_soporific );
2656 for( const bionic_id &bio_id : health_cbms ) {
2657 activate_bionic_by_id( bio_id );
2658 }
2659 if( wield_better_weapon() ) {
2660 return;
2661 }
2662 }
2663 // NPCs currently always aim when using a gun, even with no target
2664 // This simulates them aiming at stuff just at the edge of their range
2665 if( !weapon.is_gun() ) {
2666 pause();
2667 return;
2668 }
2669
2670 // Stop, drop, and roll
2671 if( has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
2672 pause();
2673 } else {
2674 aim();
2675 moves = std::min( moves, 0 );
2676 }
2677}
2678
2679static cata::optional<tripoint> nearest_passable( const tripoint &p, const tripoint &closest_to )
2680{
2681 map &here = get_map();
2682 if( here.passable( p ) ) {
2683 return p;
2684 }
2685
2686 // We need to path to adjacent tile, not the exact one
2687 // Let's pick the closest one to us that is passable
2688 std::vector<tripoint> candidates = closest_points_first( p, 1 );
2689 std::sort( candidates.begin(), candidates.end(), [ closest_to ]( const tripoint & l,
2690 const tripoint & r ) {
2691 return rl_dist( closest_to, l ) < rl_dist( closest_to, r );
2692 } );
2693 auto iter = std::find_if( candidates.begin(), candidates.end(), [&here]( const tripoint & pt ) {
2694 return here.passable( pt );
2695 } );
2696 if( iter != candidates.end() ) {
2697 return *iter;
2698 }
2699
2700 return cata::nullopt;
